intro: Here's a list of helpful links I've found while researching Olympus OM lenses, roughly organized by topic.

oemHistLinks.name: Olympus OM History by Hans van Veluwen

lensSpecLinks.name: Guide to Olympus OM lenses by Hans van Veluwen
Comparative table of Olympus OM lenses by Hans van Veluwen
Olympus Zuiko Lens Writeups & History at Photography in Malaysia
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (A great reference site (need to scroll down to view links to individual lens pages), also has good content for Canon FD, Nikon F and other lens systems)

lensSpecLinks.name: Olympus Macro Lenses by Alan Wood
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (Source of technical details on Olympus Zuiko macro lenses)

reviewLinks.name: Guide to Olympus OM lenses at Phillipreeve.net
Lens Reviews at Casual Photophile
reviewLinks.helpText: (High quality articles but their reviews unfortunately only covering a few Olympus Zuiko lenses. Highly recommended also for their camera reviews and other articles)

miscLinks.name: The Manual Focus Lenses forum at MFLenses.com
miscLinks.helpText: (This is the most active forum I've found on the subject of MF lenses of all manufacturers. A good resource)

miscLinks.name: Zuiko Lens Terminology by Hans van Veluwen
